channel.title: Which is better? The Knight or The Physician?
channel.description:
> # **[color=steblue]The Knight[/color]** ># Pros : >+ Can protect others from dying. >+ Has a killing ability. >+ Can be confirmed with CS. >+ Can confirm others with CS , although you commit suicide. >+ Counters Reaper , Limits the Possessor's **Possess** options and prevents a night kill by The Sorcerer. >+ The Best Duo to kill evils is : Butler(Cult Games)/Drunk(Unseen games) + Knight. >+ Can turn the outcome of the game. >+ Has a passive that can prevent you from dying when you successfully guard someone. > # Cons : >+ Easy fakeable. >+ BD will usually exe all knight claims on sight. >+ Can harm BD more than the others factions when played poorly. >+ Not guaranteed to spawn. >+ Can easily be found once converted.
> # **[color=steblue]The Physician[/color]** ># Pros : >+ Can protect others from dying. >+ Can protect yourself from dying. >+ Can be confirmed with the help of an **Observer** or **Noble**. >+ Can make someone immune to bleeding/poison. >+ Prevents a night kill by The Sorcerer. >+ Can cure bleeding/poison. >+ The Best Duo to survive till the end of the game : Alchemist(Cult Games)/Knight(Unseen Games - With Mastermind dead) + Physician. >+ Can be clutch in 2v2 situations. >+ Has a passive that makes you immune to poison/bleeding. >+ Is a mini investigator that finds out what killed a player. > # Cons : >+ Easy fakeable. >+ BD will try to execute the healers claims that didn't heal poison/bleeds no matter how much you try to defend yourself. >+ Reaper and Possessor's **Possess** can easily bypass healing. >+ One healer is guaranteed to spawn. This means alch can replace phys. >+ Can be easily found once converted , especially when another physcian is in the game.
So , in my opinion , Knight is better *in some situations*. What do you think?
